title: DevOps / Cloud Infrastructure Consultant (WordPress High Availability & Failover)
job_overview:
Job Type: Independent Contractor / Consultant (Project-Based)
 Location: Remote (Philippines strongly preferred)

About Us:
Leaders Marketing LLC is a fast-growing U.S.-based digital marketing agency that builds and manages high-performing websites for personal injury law firms across the country. We are currently seeking a highly experienced DevOps or Cloud Infrastructure Consultant to lead a critical, high-impact project involving high availability and failover systems for our WordPress websites.

The Opportunity:
Our client websites are essential lead-generating assets—any downtime translates to lost business. While we currently host them on Kinsta, we’re implementing a failover system with Cloudways to ensure uptime at all times. This is a project-based role focused on building a failover-ready architecture for 23 WordPress sites, ensuring no interruptions in service.

Key Responsibilities:
Design and Implement Failover Architecture: Set up automatic traffic switching from Kinsta (primary) to Cloudways (backup) in case of downtime.


Cloudflare Load Balancing Setup:
Configure Health Monitors for each website
Create Origin Pools (Kinsta + Cloudways)
Build Load Balancers with automatic failover rules
WordPress Data Synchronization Strategy:
Develop a scalable method (ideally automated) to sync databases & files between Kinsta and Cloudways


Testing and Validation:
Run full system tests to ensure fast and seamless failover

Documentation and Training:
Provide step-by-step documentation and train our internal technical team (CTO included)


What We’re Looking For (Qualifications):
Proven background in DevOps or Cloud Engineering
Hands-on experience with Cloudflare Load Balancing, DNS, and Health Checks
Deep knowledge of Kinsta, Cloudways, and WordPress migrations
Expert in handling WordPress synchronization (including databases, serialized data, and files)
Proficient in Bash, Python, or other scripting languages for automation
Experience in setting up robust monitoring systems
Excellent communication skills for non-technical stakeholders

Project Duration & Compensation:
Short-term / Project-Based
Remote work setup
Competitive compensation (please include your rate proposal)
Future project opportunities available based on performance


To Apply:
Please send the following:
Your updated resume or CV
A short cover letter describing your relevant experience
Any case studies, documentation, or project links related to WordPress HA or Cloudflare Load Balancing
Your proposed consulting rate (project-based or hourly)
